## ModelExtensions.dropSearchIndex() method

Delete an existing \[Atlas search index\](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/create-index/) by name. This function only works when connected to MongoDB Atlas.

**Signature:**

```typescript
dropSearchIndex<T>(this: Ctor<T>, name: string): Promise<void>;
```
